main:
Follows Index Prescript mechanics: Gain a {status:IndexPrescript_Base_2nd} based on her {status:BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly}
0-2: {status:IndexPrescriptDon_0} (use a marked skill)
3-5: {status:IndexPrescriptDon_1} (hit a target with a marked skill)
6-8: {status:IndexPrescriptDon_2} (hit a target with an ego awakening or a marked S3-2)
9+: {status:IndexPrescriptDon_3} (no condition)
Following the Prescript gives her SP and {status:BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly}, more if her target had {status:IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy}. Failure to follow the {status:IndexPrescript_Base} will give her {status:KarmaOfIndexAlly} instead.
{status:IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy} is assigned to a random skill (up to 2 with multiple slots) and {status:IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy} is assigned to a random enemy every turn.

If she has at least {status:UnlockBuffAlly_1}, she can consume 15 SP to enter her E.G.O state at 25+ SP, buffering her skills but making them cost SP. The first time she gains {status:UnlockBuffAlly_1}, she brings her SP up to 25 at the cost of gaining some {status:KarmaOfIndexAlly}. At 0 or less SP, she loses her E.G.O state, but can transform again if she gets back up to 25+ SP. In her E.G.O state she gains {status:Blandishment} and if she has {status:UnlockBuffAlly_3} she also gets {status:Blandishment_Shin}, further buffing her skills.
other: She can force her {status:UnlockBuff_Base} level to go up with her defense at the cost of gaining {status:KarmaOfIndexAlly} stacks.
Her skills are pretty straightforward, just follow the {status:IndexPrescript_Base} and save her S3 for when she reaches 6-8 {status:BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly}.
Her passive increases her damage and SP healing when she follows the {status:IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy} and {status:IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy} mechanics.

1031401.desc:
Deal +2% damage with Skills marked with [IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy] for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] on self (max 16%)
- At 9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly], deal +20% damage with Base Skills instead

On hit with Base Skill attacks against targets with [IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy], heal 3 SP (once per Skill; 2 times per turn)
- Heal additional SP based on [UnlockBuff_Base] stage
1031401.name: The Great Magicked Beeper Knoweth My Desire!

1031402.desc:
Turn Start:
- Gain [IndexPrescriptDon_0] / [IndexPrescriptDon_1] / [IndexPrescriptDon_2] / [IndexPrescriptDon_3] based on [UnlockBuff_Base] stage on self
- Inflict [IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy] to a random enemy (in Focused Encounters, the Part)
- Apply [IndexPrescriptTargetMarkToEnemy] to Base Attack Skills on this unit's Dashboard (1 per Slot, max 2 Skills)
Â· At [UnlockBuffAlly_2]+, the effect above prioritizes Skill 3
- All of the effects above and [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] execution checks do not trigger when this unit is Staggered, Immobilized[TabExplain], in Panic, or in E.G.O Corrosion[TabExplain]

If this unit has [UnlockBuffAlly_3] at Turn Start, gain [Blandishment_Shin]
1031402.name: Prescript Delivered on a Device

1031403.desc:
Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was executed this turn, heal 4 SP and gain 1 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] (once per turn)
- When executing [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd], if the main target has [IndexPrescriptTargetToEnemy], heal 8 SP and gain 3 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] instead

Turn End: If [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] was not executed this turn, gain 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly]
- At [UnlockBuffAlly_3], does not gain [KarmaOfIndexAlly]
- If this unit attempted to execute [IndexPrescript_Base_2nd] at Combat Start, but could not target the enemy during the combat phase, does not gain [KarmaOfIndexAlly] at Turn End
1031403.name: Will of the Prescript

1031404.desc:
Turn End: At 3/6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly], gain [UnlockBuffAlly_1]/[UnlockBuffAlly_2]/[UnlockBuffAlly_3].

If this unit gained [UnlockBuffAlly_1], consume 15 SP to enter Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration state:
- Before consuming SP to enter this state, heal SP to 25 and gain [KarmaOfIndexAlly] equal to (SP healed / 5) (rounded up)
- At Turn Start after the above checks, if this unit has [UnlockBuff_Base] and is at 25+ SP, consume 15 SP to enter this state

- If this unit gets Staggered when entering Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration state, recover from Stagger (if this unit's Stagger cannot be naturally recovered from, does not enter Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration state)
- Gain [Blandishment] while in Effloresced EGO::Procuration state

Turn Start: At 0 or less SP, this unit exits Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration state
1031404.name: Unlock / Effloresced E.G.O::Procuration

1031421.desc:
Combat Start: Heal 15 SP for the ally with the lowest SP
- This effect prioritizes Plus Coin Identities
- If the affected unit is in The Index faction, they gain 1 [AttackDmgUp] as well
- This effect does not apply to units under effects that prevent SP recovery such as E.G.O Corrosion[TabExplain], Panic, etc.
1031421.name: This, too, is the Grace of the Great Magicked Beeper!

- Gain [Breath] equal to current [UnlockBuff_Base] stage
data.name: T-the Prescript Must be Fulfilled Anon...

data.desc:
Final Power +1 for every [UnlockBuff_Base] stage (max 3)
[StartBattle] Gain Shield equal to 10% of max HP (once per turn)
- Reduce Shield gained by 1% for every 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly]; at 50+ [KarmaOfIndexAlly], does not gain Shield
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count
[EndBattle] If this unit does not have [UnlockBuff_Base], gain [UnlockBuffAlly_1] (once per turn)
- Change [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] Stack to 3
- Gain 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly] at next Turn Start for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] gained
data.name: Prescript-granted, Prescript-woven Fabric

data.desc:

- Reduce Shield gained by 1.5% for every 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly]; at 50+ [KarmaOfIndexAlly], does not gain Shield
[WhenUse] Gain +2 [Breath] Count
[EndBattle] If this unit does not have [UnlockBuff_Base], gain [UnlockBuffAlly_1] (once per turn)
- Change [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] Stack to 3
- Gain 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly] at next Turn Start for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] gained
data.name: Prescript-granted, Prescript-woven Fabric

data.desc:
[DuelCounter]
[WhenUse] Gain 3 [Breath]
[EndBattle] At lower than stage 3 [UnlockBuff_Base], activate the following (once per turn):
- If this unit has [UnlockBuff_Base], increase it by 1 stage
- At less than 6/9 [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly], change its Stack to 6/9
- Gain 5 [KarmaOfIndexAlly] at next Turn Start for every [BlessingOfIndexPrescriptAlly] gained
data.name: Compulsory Unlock
